dataset.title: Total numbers, measurements and species of insects taken from the Oksrukuyuk Creek rock scrubbings during the summer of 1992, Arctic LTER 1992.

abstract.para: Total numbers, measurements and species of insects taken from the Oksrukuyuk Creek rock scrubbings during the summer of 1992.

intellectualRights.para: Acceptance and utilization of LTER data requires that:

listitem.para: The Principal Investigator be sent a notice stating reasons for acquiring any data and a description of the publication intentions.
The Principal Investigator of the data set be sent a copy of the report or manuscript prior to submission and be adequately cited in any resultant publications

A copy of any resultant publications should be sent to:
Principal Investigator Ecosystems Center Marine Biological Laboratory Woods Hole, MA 02543

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: Just a kilometer or two upstream of where the Oksrukuyuk Creek crosses the Dalton Highway, approximately 15 miles south of the Sag River DOT station.

description.para:
For Archival Use:
DATE RECEIVED: DATA FILE ENTERED BY: DATA FILE VALIDATION: NAME: DATE:

para.literalLayout: A rock-scrubbing sampling technique was used to collect samples at several different stations, with two replicates at each station. The samples were collected about every 10 days.The same sampling procedure was used for all dates. The stations were measured relative to the site of the dripper ("-" = upstream of the dripper). The samples were preserved in ethanol then picked, sorted, counted, and measured in Duluth using a digitizing pad.
Notes: All insect measurements are from larval forms unless noted otherwise.

Variable descrip. Precis./Units Coded Missing (Y/N) Values SITE Oksrukuyuk Creek y DATE date DDMMMYY n TYPE bottom, drift, or pool sample n SPECIES abbreviation of insect measured n STATION distance from original dripper, meters n TRIAL repetition number 1 or 2 n LENGTH length of insect mm n # UN-MEASURED # of bugs counted, but not measured n COMMENTS notes about data, (this column blank) n (12) CALCULATIONS Variable Formula
